featured.text: Industry members of the IOC hope to promote the trade of olive oil by initiating these changes.
Recently, however, the International Olive Council (IOC) is seeking input on test methods to improve the transparency of the testing process and boost the accuracy of the results.
What is the IOC trying to do? (A) Train more qualified olive oil tasters.

definition.zh_def: 反轉控制，一種設計模式，通過將對象的創建和管理交給外部容器來實現對象之間的解耦。
definition.en_def: Inversion of Control, a design pattern where the control of object creation and management is transferred to an external container to achieve decoupling between objects.
definition.example: In software development, using IoC can help improve the modularity of the application.
